review: i was suffering from Diabetes for last 10 years with no improvement but one of my family friend recommended Dr.Anirban Biswas.  i had visited in November 2021 in his clinic. Dr Anirban prescribed medicines for my treatment, which has given very good results.  At present my sugar, cholostral and heart is in perfect condition and under control.  I am very much thankful to Dr.Anirban for very good treatment given to me.  I strongly recommend him for Diabetes patients to visit him.  Further Dr.Anirban advice on Food intake for me has helped me to reduce weight and keeep me fit all the time. Many thanks to Dr.Anirban for a nice treatment.
reply_text: Thanks for your kind words Mr Ramani. I am humbled by your appreciation.

review:
I'm very happy that my friend recommended me to go to Dr. Anirban Biswas  ( ABCD clinic).
My father is diabetic for the last 12 years & hv been taking medicines , but my father sugar levels were never in control . After detailed discussion with me ,he clearly explained to me the line of treatment, diet plan, do's & don'ts . He also changed the medicines from 5 to 3.
Within 2 weeks my father sugar has come under control .
Thank you Dr. Anirban Biswas.
I am confident that within 3 months my father will achieve to HbA1c from 8.9 to less than 7.0 & also reduce medicine doses further.
reply_text: Thanks for making the effort for writing and sharing this valuable feedback. I am deeply humbled .

review: Never recommend doctor to anyone... He gives you medicine which is expensive *** *** ***** **** **** *****
reply_text:
The cost of thyroid medication is roughly 100 rs per month . How is that expensive? But if you have any other comorbid conditions , you have to treat it .
Moreover my GET RID OF THYROID plan which has helped over 1000 patients to stop or decrease thyroid medication dose upto 10 times  is also very cheap costing just 3 rs per day. You don't get a cup of tea at this price.
Also, my GET RID OF INSULIN plan for diabetics is quite cheap (less than20 rs/day), which has helped over 1300 patients get rid over insulin and 30 patients reverse their diabetes completely.
God bless you and be healthy.
